description:
Ashibe-kun was looking forward to visiting Grandpa`s kitchen garden, but due to extremely hot weather, the outing must be canceled. But Ashibe-kun still wants to play outside! Maybe if there were one more of him, he`d be able to? Just then, a package of fresh fruits and vegetables from Grandpa arrives, and Pa says he`ll teach Ashibe-kun the best ways to eat corn and watermelon!
Source: crunchyroll
